title: Forever Mine (The Polaroid Series) Book 1
description: Amelia attends her high school reunion Only to run into her one and only true love JaredOld feelings return and things start to take course. But she's engaged. In fact, she left Nathan behind to attend her reunion But something tragic happens And she has to re-evaluate her life. And Nichole might be the reason it all falls apart.
author: Ava Danielle
